ContractWithCustomerLiability.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.label: Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
DeferredRevenueNoncurrent.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from reserves and accruals, classified as other.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fourth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties and Interest Expense
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAndInterest.description: The sum of the amounts of estimated penalties and interest recognized in the period arising from income tax examinations.

LegalFees.label: Legal Fees
LegalFees.description: The amount of expense provided in the period for legal costs incurred on or before the balance sheet date pertaining to resolved, pending or threatened litigation, including arbitration and mediation proceedings.

ProceedsFromCustomersForProgressPayments.label: Proceeds from Customers for Progress Payments
ProceedsFromCustomersForProgressPayments.description: Cash received from customers as progress payments on projects that have been partially completed.

RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesCo.label: Realized Gain (Loss) on Marketable Securities, Cost Method Investments, and Other Investments
RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesCo.description: This item represents the total realized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity and any gains or losses realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and/or investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity. Additionally, this item would include any losses recognized for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) of the subject investments in debt and equity securities.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.

DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.label: Deferred Revenue, Revenue Recognized
DeferredRevenueRevenueRecognized1.description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Warranty Reserves
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from warranty reserves.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.
